column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I don't usually like deep dish pizza but I guess I just hadn't had a good one until trying Lou Malnati's! We ordered the Malnati Classic and the Lou and both were SO GOOD!! The Lou is vegetarian
column2: and the mix of flavors was amazing!! Seriously
column7: basil...all of it just melts together into one perfect slice of heavenly
column9: goodness. We came here twice in one weekend
column10: that is how good it was! And the crust to topping ratio is perfect
column11: the butter crust is crispy and not too thick. The center is perfectly cooked and the pizza toppings stay on the pizza...they dont fall off in a gooey mess. It really is the perfect slice of deep dish pizza!
